name: Mortifera
description: Mortifera is a large aberration that blends seamlessly into swamp environments, resembling a bed of lotus flowers. It has a central maw and multiple tendrils.
memorable: Its ability to blend into its surroundings and its poisonous attacks make it a formidable opponent.
goals: To ambush prey in watery environments and use its poisonous attacks to incapacitate foes.
relations: Could be related to other aquatic or plant-based aberrations; might be encountered with swamp-dwelling creatures.
environment: Lurking underwater or in flower-laden swamps.
strengths: High hit points and immunity to several conditions; advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma, making it poor in social interactions or clever tactics.
attacks: Engages with Fanged Tentacles that grapple and poison, alongside Slam attacks for physical damage.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Spray, dealing significant area poison damage to multiple targets.
senses: Has blindsight for 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures it cannot see.
skills: Has a low passive Perception score of 13.
additional_information: False Appearance allows it to remain unnoticed until it attacks.
Amphibious nature enables it to thrive both in water and on land.
Magic Resistance provides a defensive advantage against spells.
Grappling with its tendrils creates a strategic advantage in combat.
Can inflict both physical and poison damage simultaneously.
test_queries: creature that blends into lotus flowers
